question: The sun is the closest star to Earth.

Water boils at 100 degrees Celsius at sea level.
Dogs are the most loyal pets.

Reading books is the best way to spend free time.

There are seven continents on Earth.
Summer is the most enjoyable season.

Classical music is boring.
The Amazon is the largest rainforest in the world.
Exercising daily improves physical health.
Action movies are better than romantic comedies.
Bananas are a good source of potassium.
Learning math is more important than learning art.
